name: Super track
description:
• Super Track - 2D retro physics racing game
  • 9 tracks + 1 bonus procedually generated track
  • Play against your friends or computer
  • Up to 4 players at one device
  • Super simple controls - only one key/touch is needed

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:
Car 1 - A

Car 2 - C

Car 3 - N

Car 4 - L

Click/Touch on timer to pause/reset

*Android version comming soon!

* Currently there are some sound issues in Firefox browser, Safari and Google Chrome seems ok
